caption: In a grand hall, the man sitting on the throne makes some decisions. His family members bow in acceptance, but those beside him seem very surprised and attempt to stop him.At the same time, in another grand hall, a duel is taking place. One knight is defeating the other knight, but the knight who is about to lose suddenly fights back after conceding defeat, pushing the victorious knight towards a cliff. The escaping knight appears very angry, but the victorious knight is undeterred.A small man exits the grand hall with the intention of borrowing money from people nearby.Meanwhile, on an open balcony, a man, a boy, and a girl are engaging romantically, displaying deep affection for each other.
